channel.title: The mundane, technical aspects of scientific practice on areshenkBlog
channel.description: Recent content in The mundane, technical aspects of scientific practice on areshenkBlog

item.title: Basic principles
item.description: Basic principles A good organizational scheme: Enforces good habits. The organization should constrain your workflow enough that you’re forced to practice good coding and research practices. Is reproducible. The organization should cover the entire workflow, from raw data to polished figures. A naive observer should be able to understand the organization of the project and replicate the analysis with a minimum of effort. Is interpretable. The organization should be simple enough to be interpretable to a naive observer.

item.title: A postcard
item.description: Pre-requisites First, make sure you have the latest version of the postcards package installed from CRAN: install.packages("postcards") Restart your R session. If you use RStudio, use the menu item Session > Restart R or the associated keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + F10 (Windows and Linux) or Command + Shift + F10 (Mac OS). packageVersion("postcards") [1] ‘0.2.0’ Create GitHub repo Online. Clone GitHub repo usethis::create_from_github("https://github.com/apreshill/global-postcard.git") ✨ Commit & Push! ✨
